task.title: Capture a Region Screenshot
task.shortdesc: How to capture a region screenshot.

context.p: A region screenshot will only capture the area you select. This type of screenshot is useful when you only need a small portion of the screen or program UI.

step.cmd: Set the Selection type to Region.
Set Effects and Share to None.
Toggle the Capture Cursor option off.
step.info: The toggle icon should be grey when it is turned off.

step.cmd: Toggle the Preview in Editor option on.
step.info: The toggle icon should be blue when it is turned on.

step.cmd: Move your mouse to the top corner of the capture area.
Hold down the left mouse button.
Drag the mouse diagonally to the bottom corner of the capture area.

taskbody.result: Snagit Editor will open up and display the screenshot you captured.
